features: 【Tidy and Sturdy】 The bookcase has 9 open shelves and can accommodate lots of books and other ornaments while taking up only a small floor area. Product size: 50.8 x 15.7 x 7.9 inch (H x L x W), perfect for apartments, narrow spaces, classrooms or corners. Base size: 15.7 x 7.9 inch. Wide support area and strong load base to keep the shelf balance

【Multi-functional Bookshelves】Modern style independent open design, easy reach and move. Inspired by nature, the bookshelf finished with a tree-branch structure, it's attractive, elegant display book shelves. Perfectly to display for book and magazine, albums or other favorite collections in your living room, to store books, files and other decorative stuff in your working office.

【High Quality Material】 Made of high quality wood, with smooth and high gloss finish, tough texture and the firm structure. Won’t be decayed or damaged. The bolts would never scratch the books. Anti-toppling accessories are included to prevent falling over.

【Easy To Assemble】Minimal assembly effort required. 15 minutes assemble & easy cleaning. Comes with included clear and detailed instructions, numbered parts, and a L shaped allen wrench for assembly. The shelves can easily be cleaned with a wet rag.

【Professional After-sales Services】A prompt response will always be there no matter before or after-sales. Any quality problems, pls contact us, our experienced customer service team will respond in 24 hours ASAP

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Tree Bookshelf, Floor Standing Storage Organizer Shelves Provide An Tidy Living And Sturdy Environment: Keep your books accessible and neat while adding personality to your living or office space. This tree bookcase is durable enough to hold plenty of stackable books, magazines, or trinkets, will keep reading material neatly coordinated, super accessible and uniquely displayed. In an office setting, the shelves can be piled with files, books, or office decor. Features: Easy to assemble Sturdy structure and sleek finish. Ideal for books, magazines, cd, or decor to store and display Ideal for living room, office, bedroom, or library Durable MDF wood composition and ample shelf space for stackable books The High-density MDF board is waterproof and wear-resisting, making daily cleaning much easier. Multi-layer separation and storage, Improve space utilization, Open design, very convenient to fetch or place your book. Specifications Color: Rustic Brown Material: MDF Weight: 12.12lbs Size: 50.8 x 15.7 x 7.9 inches (H x L x W) Include: 1 x Tree Bookshelf 1 x Anti-toppling Accessories 1 x Installation package

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It looks exactly as in the picture.
reviews.reviewText: It is pretty and strong. I thought more books would feet but i think that about 45 books can fit. It doesn't ocupy too much space in the room. That is what I like the most about it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great storage for a small space!
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble, it took about 30 minutes. I have over 30 books on it as we speak! Small footprint. I would buy this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’m very impressed with the quality of the wood and how beautiful it looks. I will say assembly was a bit confusing, I had to undo and redo some parts but it’s not too bad. Have someone to help you put it together if you can but I did it alone (took a little longer).Assembly tips: make sure you align the planks so all the holes are to one side to attach the back part. I didn’t pay attention the first time around and only realized when it was time to attach the back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: A must have if you are looking for a small book shelf. Fits perfectly on a side table or dresser. Also a nice stand alone shelf. 5 🌟

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Assembly takes a minute . . .
reviews.reviewText: I really like this book case and needed it in my crafting space to hold all of my newly acquired watercolor books, coloring books, and drawing books, etc. I was running out of space. It comes in a small box - smaller than you'd think for a book shelf you have to put together, and assembly is easy (no), complicated (not exactly), required attention to detail (yeah, that's it.). I don't think there wasn't a shelf that I didn't have to unscrew and readjust in order set everything right, but it did all come together well. It is sturdy, but I do recommend anchoring it if you can, especially if you have lots of book. Also I would recommend you put your largest and heaviest at the bottom and work your way up. All in all, I'm glad to have it, and if I had more room, I'd get another.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Product did not match instructions
reviews.reviewText: As seen in step 6 with pieces d and e, there are supposed to be small holes to attach piece d to stabilize pieces 123 to become the back wall of the product. These holes aren’t present on the front or back of pieces 1 2 and 3. Are we supposed to drill them ourselves? We cannot complete the assembly and demand our money back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Questionable material. Gets the job done though
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. There is a significant leaning forward of the bookshelf from the wall at the top part. The material is particleboard. Not sure it’s going to continue leaning forward or attaching it to the wall will stop it. The base is a little small for the height of the product, which makes it wobbly. I highly recommend attaching it to the wall. We will keep it because my son likes it and it gets the job done for now. Putting it together was pretty easy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Holds quite a few of my oversized books perfect
reviews.reviewText: I purchased book tree after I came across it searching for bohemian style storage for my 300+ adult coloring book obsession/collection. I I thought it was very unique looking compared to all others. As you can see in photo it stores great amount of large hard back favorite books. You can't beat the price either, but great deal! I actually have two. When the box was delivered I opened it and inside was another box labeled Computer Desk. I never bothered opening it because I assumed it was wrong and called customer support right away and they shipped out another box. I This time again box said computer desk but on this side was outlined picture of the correct book tree shelf. I missed image on first one. I I was happy so I got to keep both. I had two different male friends put them together. Like most men they refused to read directions. Lol stobborn. I they both started adding shelf to back one at a time and it was tricky. I read instructions and pictures showed to assemble bad and back, but put all the shelves together in zigzag fork. Then you add the shelves as a whole to base and back.For some reason both had one back screw unable to go in. However it was very sturdy and I was couldn't wait to put my books on display! I am overall satisfied.

reviews.reviewTitle: To difficult to assemble some screws were faulty
reviews.reviewText: For me this was a nightmare to assemble the picture instructions were not very helpful paid way to much for this and I advise if you by this have someone to help its way to complicated especially if you are elderly. Not worth the money.
